notable_ideas: Picture theory of language, Truth functions States of affairs, Logical necessity, Meaning is use, Language-games, Private language argument, Family resemblance, Rule following , Forms of life, Fideism#Wittgenstein and fideism
name: Ludwig Wittgenstein
influences: Gottlob Frege, Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, Søren Kierkegaard, G. E. Moore, Oswald Spengler, Ludwig Boltzmann, Karl Kraus, Adolf Loos, Piero Sraffa, Otto Weininger, Bertrand Russell, Arthur Schopenhauer, Baruch Spinoza, Leo Tolstoy, Heinrich Hertz   Hermann von Helmholtz
influenced: Jacques Derrida, Bertrand Russell, G.E. Moore, Frank P. Ramsey, Vienna Circle, Rudolf Carnap, Alan Turing, G.E.M. Anscombe, Gilbert Ryle, Saul Kripke, Daniel Dennett, John Searle, Hans Sluga, Peter Hacker, Stephen Toulmin
